replies.body: Yet another thing that blows about this forum. There's literally not one positive thing about this excuse for a forum.

Of course it has positives, I mean, we all get to circlejerk together right?

That being said, the negatives outweigh the positives.
That was a strange decision.  I mean anyone planning on evaluating someone's comments based on rank is still going to look people up.

> That was a strange decision.  I mean anyone planning on evaluating someone's comments based on rank is still going to look people up.

I think that was a double edge sword too, a lot of plat + trolled on the forums too.
Damn I miss the old forums
I have no way to show how good I am at the game now {{item:{{item:3070}}
FEK will be able to put ranked icons back in, though I don't have plans to do that until maybe a week or two because there are other more important features/bugs I need to do/fix.
I finally hit diamond, but now I can't use it to look important when I post opinions on stuff :(
I finally make it to plat and now i wont even get a forum badge b/c this reddit bs. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
